FuncDef: This command allows the remapping of all existing hosts if network card on CMTS/WAC side is changed is required.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the old MAC address to remap.

Specifies that the provisioned MAC address will be used in the anti-spoofing entries for this SAP when the l2-header is enabled. This parameter may be changed mid-session. Existing sessions will not be re-programmed unless a tools perform command is issued for the lease.
Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
